text:
Tipsy autorickshaw

driver slits his throat

N. Zaheer Hussain(32), an autorickshaw driver, reportedly slit his throat with a broken piece of bottle after the police caught him for driving under the influence of alcohol on Friday.

The auto driver hailed from Kamarajapuram near R.S. Puram.

He was taking a passenger in his vehicle when

he was stopped by the police near Chinthamani Junction. Realising that he would be penalised, Hussain slit his throat with a broken piece of bottle and suffered injuries, police said.

A case has been registered.
title: Autorickshaw driver caught drunk slits neck in public
